content: Yes, one of the books mentioned, "Walkaway" by Cory Doctorow, features AI as a key aspect of its futuristic society. In the novel, AI technology has advanced to the point where it is able to perform many tasks that were previously done by humans, including managing the economy and ensuring that everyone has access to resources. The novel explores the potential benefits and risks of this level of AI integration, including questions about how to ensure that the technology is used in a way that benefits everyone in society, rather than just a privileged few.
